visual.name: MultipleAxesChartByxViz
visual.description: Display up to five separate axis values each with their own series type spanning column, line, spline and area.

dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Fields to place on the horizontal or Vertical Axis

dataRoles.name: legend
dataRoles.description: The categorical field to show for color

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign data to be shown in tooltip

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

alignThreshold.description: Ensures that the zeroes in all axes are aligned

conditionalFormattingLegend.description: Show Conditional Formatting Rules in Legend, along with the standard Legend items. Helps select/deselect conditional formatting rules during runtime. At least one category must be assigned to Legend field to use this feature.

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

autoHideAxisLabels.description: When visual's plot area is small, hides axis label to ensure better visibility

connectNullValues.description: When using line or spline to plot values, ignore empty/null values to ensure that a single continuous line is plotted without breaks

fontColor.description: Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

innerPadding.description: Pad the Space Between Data points

maxLabelHeight.description: The maximum height of the axis labels as a % of plot area. The value can range between 15-50%.

maxLabelWidth.description: The maximum width of the axis label

maxLength.description: Maximum number of Data Series to be displayed without a scrollbar.

xAxisReverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

xAxisShowNthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

xAxisposition.description: Select an x-axis position (bottom or top). When the 'chart orientation' property in 'chart options' is set to 'Horizontal', the x-axis toggles between left and right.

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Select the position of the Y Axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the intervel on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Select the position of the Y Axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Select the position of the Y Axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the intervel on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Select the position of the Y Axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Select the position of the Y Axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order

dlXOffset.description: X axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

dlYOffset.description: Y axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

enableDataLabelFormatting.description: Enable to format the Data Labels

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

altGridHorizontal.description: Set a Color between alternate grid lines

altGridVertical.description: Set a Color between alternate grid lines

endHorizontal.description: End value for the Horizontal band

endVertical.description: End value for the Vertical band

horizontalReferenceValue.description: The value for the horizontal reference line

startHorizontal.description: Start value for the Horizontal band

startVertical.description: Start value for the Vertical band

verticalReferenceLine.description: The value on the Y Axis for the reference line

verticalReferenceValue.description: The value on the Y Axis for the reference line

verticalReferenceValue2.description: The value on the Y Axis for the reference line

enablertl.description: Choose to have the values on the legend displayed from right to left - useful for right-to-left languages such as Arabic

hposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend

vposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend

dragSelectionAction.description: Lasso and inverse lasso section options for category members

enableAnnotation.description: Ability to annotate or comment on the chart

enableDeviation.description: Works only on column series type

showSTByDefault.description: Show Table as the default View

panningKey.description: Select the key to hold to pan the chart when zoomed in

pinchType.description: Select if the Pinch and Zoom can be done by the X, Y or both Axes

lasso.description: Selecting multiple values in the data series to perform filtering action based on selection

reverselasso.description: Same as Lasso option except that the reverse lasso excludes data points selected
